name: ma
author: Patrick Dubroy <pdubroy@gmail.com> (http://dubroy.com)

scripts.test-continuous: npm test; dirwatch *.js lib/*.js test/*.js -c 'which tput && tput clear; date; tape test/*.js' | tap-spec
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint

description: An experiment in loosely-coupled coordination of processes -- inspired by tuple spaces.
